meanings.definition: A person who looks down on or belittles others.
meanings.sent1: The misprizers in the group always made fun of people who were different.
meanings.sent2: She felt hurt by the misprizers who mocked her for being shy.
meanings.sent3: The misprizers at the party thought they were better than everyone else.
meanings.sent4: The misprizers in the office towered over their colleagues with their arrogant attitudes.
meanings.sent5: The misprizers' words were like sharp knives, cutting into the self-esteem of those around them.

meanings.definition: Those who underestimate or undervalue something.
meanings.sent1: The misprizers dismissed the importance of the new technology.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a misprizer and recognize the value of hard work.
meanings.sent3: The misprizers underestimated the impact of the small gesture.
meanings.sent4: Her coach was a misprizer of her abilities until she proved him wrong.
meanings.sent5: The misprizers failed to see the beauty in the simple things around them.
